description:
Anodyne is a unique Zelda-like game, influenced by games such as Yume Nikki and Link's Awakening. 
In Anodyne, you'll visit areas urban, natural, and bizarre, fighting your way through dungeons 
and areas in Young's subconscious.

v0.1.0.description:
Initial release of the Anodyne Archipelago world.

Requires Archipelago 0.5.0 or greater. You can install it by double clicking on it, or by putting it in the lib/worlds folder of your Archipelago installation. A template yaml file with all of Anodyne's options is attached for convenience.

See the [AnodyneArchipelagoClient README](https://github.com/SephDB/AnodyneArchipelagoClient?tab=readme-ov-file#installation) for instructions on how to use this world.
v0.1.0.title: Anodyne Apworld v0.1.0

v0.1.1.description:
Fixed a handful of logic bugs.

Requires Archipelago 0.5.0 or greater. You can install it by double clicking on it, or by putting it in the custom_worlds folder of your Archipelago installation. A template yaml file with all of Anodyne's options is attached for convenience.

See the [AnodyneArchipelagoClient README](https://github.com/SephDB/AnodyneArchipelagoClient?tab=readme-ov-file#installation) for instructions on how to use this world.
v0.1.1.title: Anodyne Apworld v0.1.1

v0.1.2.description:
* Fixed issue with multiple Anodyne slots interfering with one another.
* Combat is now required for the Extend cave chest.
* Universal Tracker can now see the values of some more options, including `endgame_card_requirement`.

Requires Archipelago 0.5.0 or greater. You can install it by double clicking on it, or by putting it in the custom_worlds folder of your Archipelago installation. A template yaml file with all of Anodyne's options is attached for convenience.

See the [AnodyneArchipelagoClient README](https://github.com/SephDB/AnodyneArchipelagoClient?tab=readme-ov-file#installation) for instructions on how to use this world.
v0.1.2.title: Anodyne Apworld v0.1.2

v0.1.3.description:
- Added player sprite option
- Added traps
- Various logic fixes.

Requires Archipelago 0.5.0 or greater. You can install it by double clicking on it, or by putting it in the custom_worlds folder of your Archipelago installation. A template yaml file with all of Anodyne's options is attached for convenience.

See the [AnodyneArchipelagoClient README](https://github.com/SephDB/AnodyneArchipelagoClient?tab=readme-ov-file#installation) for instructions on how to use this world.
v0.1.3.title: Anodyne Apworld v0.1.3

v0.1.4.description:
* Fixed Mountain Cavern and Red Cave nexus gate items not being added when nexus gate shuffle is on.

Requires Archipelago 0.5.0 or greater. You can install it by double clicking on it, or by putting it in the custom_worlds folder of your Archipelago installation. A template yaml file with all of Anodyne's options is attached for convenience.

See the [AnodyneArchipelagoClient README](https://github.com/SephDB/AnodyneArchipelagoClient?tab=readme-ov-file#installation) for instructions on how to use this world.
v0.1.4.title: Anodyne Apworld v0.1.4

v0.1.5.description:
* Added option to disable GO Color Puzzle randomization. This removes the logic expectation that you beat Servants, Watcher, and Manager before entering the top half of GO, which can significantly shorten games.
* Fixed logic bug where you could be expected to go from the top of GO to the bottom without Swap.
* Fixed logic bug where you could be expected to get Beach - Secret Chest without being able to open the 8 Card Gate.

Requires Archipelago 0.5.0 or greater. You can install it by double clicking on it, or by putting it in the custom_worlds folder of your Archipelago installation. A template yaml file with all of Anodyne's options is attached for convenience.

See the [AnodyneArchipelagoClient README](https://github.com/SephDB/AnodyneArchipelagoClient?tab=readme-ov-file#installation) for instructions on how to use this world.
v0.1.5.title: Anodyne Apworld v0.1.5

v0.1.6.description:
* Fixed logic bugs:
  * Apartment 3F access now requires Jump Shoes.
  * Two checks in the right Red Cave now require a broom.
  * Two Apartment 1F checks that were marked as requiring Jump Shoes now no longer do.
  * The Red Cave tentacles are no longer marked as requiring a broom when Red Cave is randomized.

Requires Archipelago 0.5.0 or greater. You can install it by double clicking on it, or by putting it in the custom_worlds folder of your Archipelago installation. A template yaml file with all of Anodyne's options is attached for convenience.

See the [AnodyneArchipelagoClient README](https://github.com/SephDB/AnodyneArchipelagoClient?tab=readme-ov-file#installation) for instructions on how to use this world.
v0.1.6.title: Anodyne Apworld v0.1.6

v0.1.7.description:
* Fixed logic bug that could expect you to do the Space Challenge Area without Jump Shoes.

Requires Archipelago 0.5.0 or greater. You can install it by double clicking on it, or by putting it in the custom_worlds folder of your Archipelago installation. A template yaml file with all of Anodyne's options is attached for convenience.

See the [AnodyneArchipelagoClient README](https://github.com/SephDB/AnodyneArchipelagoClient?tab=readme-ov-file#installation) for instructions on how to use this world.
v0.1.7.title: Anodyne Apworld v0.1.7

v0.1.8.description:
* Setting the "random nexus gates open count" option too high no longer crashes generation. Instead, it outputs a warning, and reduces the number to the maximum possible.

Requires Archipelago 0.5.0 or greater. You can install it by double clicking on it, or by putting it in the custom_worlds folder of your Archipelago installation. A template yaml file with all of Anodyne's options is attached for convenience.

See the [AnodyneArchipelagoClient README](https://github.com/SephDB/AnodyneArchipelagoClient?tab=readme-ov-file#installation) for instructions on how to use this world.
v0.1.8.title: Anodyne Apworld v0.1.8

v0.1.9.description:
* "Red Cave - Middle Cave Left Tentacle" now logically requires a broom.

Requires Archipelago 0.5.1 or greater. You can install it by double clicking on it, or by putting it in the custom_worlds folder of your Archipelago installation. A template yaml file with all of Anodyne's options is attached for convenience.

See the [AnodyneArchipelagoClient README](https://github.com/SephDB/AnodyneArchipelagoClient?tab=readme-ov-file#installation) for instructions on how to use this world.
v0.1.9.title: Anodyne Apworld v0.1.9

v0.2.0.description:
- Added Dustsanity, which makes every piece of dust give you an item.
- Added key rings, which opens every key block in a dungeon once collected.
- Fully customizable gates. Change their type and what is required to open them!
- Customizable card count in item pool.
- Made the secret paths in Fields be out of logic without swapper, as an option.
- Removed the player sprite option (this is moved to the client).
- Renamed the trap option names.

Requires Archipelago 0.6.0 or greater. You can install it by double clicking on it, or by putting it in the custom_worlds folder of your Archipelago installation. A template yaml file with all of Anodyne's options is attached for convenience.

See the [AnodyneArchipelagoClient README](https://github.com/SephDB/AnodyneArchipelagoClient?tab=readme-ov-file#installation) for instructions on how to use this world.
v0.2.0.title: Anodyne Apworld v0.2.0

v0.2.1.description:
**v0.2.0 changes**:

- Added Dustsanity, which makes every piece of dust give you an item.
- Added key rings, which opens every key block in a dungeon once collected.
- Fully customizable gates. Change their type and what is required to open them!
- Customizable card count in item pool.
- Made the secret paths in Fields be out of logic without swapper, as an option.
- Removed the player sprite option (this is moved to the client).
- Renamed the trap option names.

**v0.2.1 changes**:

- Fixed a crash that would happen when generating with the debug log level.

Requires Archipelago 0.6.0 or greater. You can install it by double clicking on it, or by putting it in the custom_worlds folder of your Archipelago installation. A template yaml file with all of Anodyne's options is attached for convenience.

See the [AnodyneArchipelagoClient README](https://github.com/SephDB/AnodyneArchipelagoClient?tab=readme-ov-file#installation) for instructions on how to use this world.
v0.2.1.title: Anodyne Apworld v0.2.1

v0.2.2.description:
**v0.2.0 changes**:

- Added Dustsanity, which makes every piece of dust give you an item.
- Added key rings, which opens every key block in a dungeon once collected.
- Fully customizable gates. Change their type and what is required to open them!
- Customizable card count in item pool.
- Made the secret paths in Fields be out of logic without swapper, as an option.
- Removed the player sprite option (this is moved to the client).
- Renamed the trap option names.

**v0.2.1 changes**:

- Fixed a crash that would happen when generating with the debug log level.

**v0.2.2 changes**:

- Added better slot data for poptracker

Requires Archipelago 0.6.0 or greater. You can install it by double clicking on it, or by putting it in the custom_worlds folder of your Archipelago installation. A template yaml file with all of Anodyne's options is attached for convenience.

See the [AnodyneArchipelagoClient README](https://github.com/SephDB/AnodyneArchipelagoClient?tab=readme-ov-file#installation) for instructions on how to use this world.
v0.2.2.title: Anodyne Apworld 0.2.2

v0.2.3r2.description:
**v0.2.0 changes**:

- Added Dustsanity, which makes every piece of dust give you an item.
- Added key rings, which opens every key block in a dungeon once collected.
- Fully customizable gates. Change their type and what is required to open them!
- Customizable card count in item pool.
- Made the secret paths in Fields be out of logic without swapper, as an option.
- Removed the player sprite option (this is moved to the client).
- Renamed the trap option names.

**v0.2.1 changes**:

- Fixed a crash that would happen when generating with the debug log level.

**v0.2.2 changes**:

- Added better slot data for poptracker

**v0.2.3 changes**:

- Fixed a logic issue with Sage/Terminal, require Jump Shoes in more places for damage avoidance reasons

Requires Archipelago 0.6.0 or greater. You can install it by double clicking on it, or by putting it in the custom_worlds folder of your Archipelago installation. A template yaml file with all of Anodyne's options is attached for convenience.

See the [AnodyneArchipelagoClient README](https://github.com/SephDB/AnodyneArchipelagoClient?tab=readme-ov-file#installation) for instructions on how to use this world.
v0.2.3r2.title: Anodyne Apworld 0.2.3

v0.2.4.description:
- Support for tracking using Universal Tracker without a yaml present
 - Various logic fixes, mostly to do with dustsanity
 - Clarified the wording on a few options
 - Added several new item groups for easier hinting
 
Requires Archipelago 0.6.0 or greater. You can install it by double clicking on it, or by putting it in the custom_worlds folder of your Archipelago installation. A template yaml file with all of Anodyne's options is attached for convenience.

See the [AnodyneArchipelagoClient README](https://github.com/SephDB/AnodyneArchipelagoClient?tab=readme-ov-file#installation) for instructions on how to use this world.
v0.2.4.title: Anodyne Apworld 0.2.4

v0.2.5.description: Small logic fix for dustsanity in redcave.
v0.2.5.title: Anodyne Apworld 0.2.5

v0.2.6.description:
- Fix yamlless UT not tracking small key settings correctly
 - Fix logic for Near Terminal Dust
v0.2.6.title: Anodyne Apworld 0.2.6

v0.2.7.description: - Added missing randomize_color_puzzle setting to Slot Data
v0.2.7.title: Anodyne Apworld 0.2.7

v0.3.0.description:
- Added Miao as a Progression Item
- Added Mitra Hints
- Added Shop Items
v0.3.0.title: Anodyne Apworld 0.3.0

v0.3.1.description: - Fixed generation failing when small keys are set to original dungeons
v0.3.1.title: Anodyne Apworld 0.3.1

v0.4.0.description:
Note: this version of the AP World and the Client are not backwards compatible. Do not upgrade while playing a game!

- Added Red and Blue Dams items as an option (required to fight Briar)
- Added Universal Tracker Map support
- Made Cards Progression Deprioritized
- Renamed several Regions and Locations
- Fixed logic errors
v0.4.0.title: Anodyne Apworld 0.4.0

v0.4.1.description:
Externalizes the Universal Tracker pack to lessen demands on hosts.

This means that on first load of Universal Tracker, it'll ask about the poptracker pack. This is the anodyne-UniversalTracker.zip that is placed alongside the apworld in this and all following releases.

Remember to update this file alongside your apworld for future releases, it needs to be in sync.
v0.4.1.title: Anodyne APWorld 0.4.1

v0.5.0.description:
- Added Rocksanity! Rocks can now give you checks when interacted with
- Added Trap Weights
- Added Manifest File
- Added Split and Swapper settings to Universal Tracker. Use map selector to access them
- Moved Swapper areas to data storage instead of being hardcoded in client
- Fixed Universal Tracker support
- Fixed some Debug locations having their names swapped
- Fixed duplicate Mitra hints
- Fixed some locations being in the wrong region
v0.5.0.title: Anodyne APWorld 0.5.0

v0.5.1.description:
- Added new traps
  - Phone trap
  - Grayscale trap
  - Chaos mode trap
- Fixed some location and region requirements
- Fixed UT integration
v0.5.1.title: Anodyne APWorld 0.5.1

v0.5.2.description: - Fixed Deep Forest region logic when coming from Cliffs
v0.5.2.title: Anodyne APWorld 0.5.2
